name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_modality
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.modality for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.modality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Imaging modality used. This may include both acquisition and non-acquisition modalities.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.modality` has no related element in R4B:DocumentReference `DocumentReference.modality` maps to R4B `Media.modality`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Imaging modality used. This may include both acquisition and non-acquisition modalities.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.modality` has no related element in R4B:DocumentReference `DocumentReference.modality` maps to R4B `Media.modality`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Type of acquired data in the instance.
